welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Loos, a charming city known for its rich history and scenic beauty. Get ready to explore and immerse yourself in all that this wonderful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lesquin Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Lesquin Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited bandwidth or time restrictions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kortrijk Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kortrijk Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
